display.title: Electromagnetic Separator
description: The Electromagnetic Separator is an interesting machine that skips &&6two processing stages&&r, but usually returns &&2unique&&r byproducts that aren't usually too simple to obtain. You'll need to process down pure dusts to use this - so &&bmake sure&&r you route any desired ores correctly.
You may &&bappreciate&&r performing this stage of processing on the following ores:
- Bastnasite Ore &&7(This is particularly strong for Neodymium!)&&r
- Naquadah Ore &&7(The Enriched Naquadah byproduct is very powerful!)&&r
